headline: Citizens Financial Group (CFG): Assessing Valuation After Series F Preferred Stock Redemption Announcement
summary: If you have been watching Citizens Financial Group (CFG), the latest announcement may have caught your eye. On October 6, 2025, the company will redeem all outstanding shares of its Series F Preferred Stock. This move marks the end of related dividend payments for that issue. Decisions like this reshape the capital structure and can send a clear signal to investors about management’s evolving priorities around dividends, balance sheet, and capital efficiency. This decision comes amid a year...
